articles.title: Taiwan to invest $250B in US semiconductor manufacturing

articles.title: Iran’s internet shutdown is now one of its longest ever, as protests continue
articles.description: Iran’s government-imposed internet shutdown enters its second week as authorities continue their violent crackdown on protesters.
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: The US imposes 25% tariff on Nvidia’s H200 AI chips headed to China
articles.description: The Trump administration formalized its 25% cut of H200 chip sales in China with a tariff that applies to certain semiconductors.
